name: Portobello Mushroom Pizzas

ingredients.name: Pizza Seasoning or Marinara Sauce Mix

preparation: Preheat oven to 400° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.

Remove mushroom stems and use a spoon to scrape out and discard gills. Place mushroom caps in Multipurpose Steamer. Drizzle with oil and sprinkle with seasoning; gently toss to coat. Cover and microwave on high 4 min.
When mushrooms are cooked, place on pan with underside of caps facing up. Divide sauce, cheese, and pepper between caps. Bake 8–10 min, or until cheese is bubbly.
tips: Try this recipe with your favourite pizza toppings!
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 1⁄2 cup cooked grains.

products.name: Pizza Seasoning (1002291)
summary: In a world of complex gastronomy, pizza is a testament to the simple pleasures we all crave. Now you can get it by the spoonful! This blend delivers the nostalgic flavours and feeling of eating pizza, with notes of basil, oregano, garlic, tomato, and green bell peppers with loads of Parmesan. And yes, there is a mild whisper of chilli, too!
